title: Warm Hearts Winter Drive
description: Collecting warm clothes and blankets to support families living in remote villages during the harsh winter season.

title: Sylhet Flood Relief 2025
description: Providing food, medicine, and temporary shelters for those affected by the recent floods in Sylhet.

title: Chattogram Coastal Aid
description: Supplying clean water and hygiene kits to coastal communities impacted by rising tides and water contamination.

title: Khulna Tree Plantation Project
description: Raising funds for large-scale mangrove tree plantation to combat climate change and protect Sundarbans wildlife.

title: Rajshahi Education for All
description: Donating school supplies, uniforms, and books to underprivileged children in rural Rajshahi areas.

title: Barishal Medical Aid
description: Supporting mobile health clinics to provide emergency treatment to cyclone-affected villages.

title: Mymensingh Orphan Care
description: Providing daily meals, clothing, and education to orphaned children in Mymensingh.

title: Rangpur Winter Blanket Drive
description: Distributing warm blankets and jackets to families suffering in the northern cold waves of Rangpur.
